þanuh qaþ du þamma usliþin:
urreisands nim þana ligr þeinana jah gagg in gard þeinana.
MATT 9.7 jah urreisands galaiþ in gard seinana.
MATT 9.8 gasaiƕandeins þan manageins ohtedun sildaleikjandans jah mikilidedun guþ þana gibandan waldufni swaleikata mannam.
MATT 9.9 jah þairhleiþands Iesus jainþro gasaƕ mannan sitandan at motai, Maþþaiu haitanana, jah qaþ du imma:
laistei afar mis.
jah usstandands iddja afar imma.
MATT 9.10 jah warþ, biþe is anakumbida in garda, jah sai, managai motarjos jah frawaurhtai qimandans miþanakumbidedun Iesua jah siponjam is.
MATT 9.11 jah gaumjandans Fareisaieis qeþun du þaim siponjam is:
duƕe miþ motarjam jah frawaurhtaim matjiþ sa laisareis izwar?
MATT 9.12 iþ Iesus gahausjands qaþ du im:
ni þaurbun hailai lekeis, ak þai unhaili habandans.
MATT 9.13 Aþþan gaggaiþ,
ganimiþ ƕa sijai:
armahairtiþa wiljau jah ni hunsl;
niþþan qam laþon uswaurhtans, ak frawaurhtans.
MATT 9.14 þanuh atiddjedun siponjos Iohannes qiþandans:
duƕe weis jah Fareisaieis fastam filu, iþ þai siponjos þeinai ni fastand?
MATT 9.15 jah qaþ du im Iesus:
ibai magun sunjus bruþfadis qainon und þata ƕeilos þei miþ im ist bruþfaþs?
iþ atgagggand dagos, þan afnimada af im sa bruþfaþs, jah þan fastand.
MATT 9.16 aþþan ni ƕashun lagjiþ du plata fanan þarihis ana snagan fairnjana, unte afnimiþ fullon af þamma snagin, jah wairsiza gataura wairþiþ.
MATT 9.17 Niþþan giutand wein niujata in balgins fairnjans,
aiþþau distaurnand balgeis;
biþeh þan jah wein usgutniþ jah balgeis fraqistnand;
ak giutand wein juggata in balgins niujans, jah bajoþum gabairgada.
MATT 9.18 miþþanei is rodida þata du im, þaruh reiks ains qimands inwait ina, qiþands þatei
dauhtar meina nu gaswalt;
akei qimands atlagei handu þeina ana ija, jah libaiþ.
MATT 9.19 jah urreisands Iesus iddja afar imma jah siponjos is.
MATT 9.20 jah sai, qino bloþarinnandei ·ib· wintruns duatgaggandei aftaro attaitok skauta wastjos is;
MATT 9.21 qaþuh auk in sis:
jabai þatainei atteka wastjai is, ganisa.
MATT 9.22 iþ Iesus gawandjands sik jah gasaiƕands þo qaþ:
þrafstei þuk dauhtar!
galaubeins þeina ganasida þuk.
jah ganas so qino fram þizai ƕeilai jainai.
MATT 9.23 jah qimands Iesus in garda þis reikis jah gasaiƕands swigljans jah managein auhjondein, qaþ du im:
MATT 9.24 afleiþiþ, unte ni gaswalt so mawi, ak slepiþ.
jah bihlohun ina.
MATT 9.25 þanuh þan usdribana warþ so managei, atgaggands inn habaida handu izos, jah urrais so mawi.
MATT 9.26 jah usiddja meriþa so and alla jaina airþa.
MATT 9.27 jah ƕarbondin Iesua jainþro, laistidedun afar imma twai blindans, hropjandans jah qiþandans:
armai uggkis, sunau Daweidis!
MATT 9.28 Qimandin þan in garda duatiddjedun imma þai blindans jah qaþ im Iesus:
ga-laubjats-u þatei magjau þata taujan?
Qeþun du imma:
jai, frauja!
MATT 9.29 þanuh attaitok augam ize qiþands:
bi galaubeinai iggqarai wairþai iggqis.
MATT 9.30 jah usluknodedun im augona, jah inagida ins Iesus qiþands:
saiƕats ei manna ni witi.
MATT 9.31 iþ eis usgaggandans usmeridedun ina in allai airþai jainai.
MATT 9.32 þanuh biþe utusiddjedun eis, sai, atberun imma mannan baudana daimonari.
MATT 9.33 jah biþe usdribans warþ unhulþo, rodida sa dumba, jah sildaleikidedun manageins qiþandans:
ni aiw swa uskunþ was in Israela.
MATT 9.34 iþ Fareisaieis qeþun:
in fauramaþlja unhulþono usdreibiþ unhulþons.
MATT 9.35 jah bitauh Iesus baurgs allos jah haimos laisjands in gaqumþim ize, jah merjands aiwaggeljon þiudangardjos jah hailjands allos sauhtins jah alla unhailja.
MATT 9.36 gasaiƕands þan þos manageins infeinoda in ize, unte wesun afdauidai jah frawaurpanai swe lamba ni habandona hairdeis.
MATT 9.37 þanuh qaþ du siponjam seinaim:
